## Team Activity: Human Robot

* Try to stack some cups -- blindfolded
* Put the blind-fold on
* Take turns giving verbal commands

> 3 minutes to stack 10 cups

## The Rules

* Sit together each week
* Build with 2 robotics kits
* You can build one big robot or two robots
* The robots can be the same or completely different
* You can re-use a robot from [OneKitProjects.com](https://www.onekitprojects.com/51515)
